Class MasterConnection

java.lang.Object
MasterConnection
public class MasterConnection
extends java.lang.Object
Class that simulators use to communicate with master application via network.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MasterConnection​(java.net.Socket socket)
    Master connection constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean listen​(Simulator simulator)
    Accepts commands from master application and executes them using respective methods of simulator.
    void sendExtract​(Location[] area)
    Sends information about Locations in the area.
    void sendHealthCalculatedConfirmation()
    Sends a confirmation to the master that this simulator has ended calculating peoples health.
    void sendPeopleMovedConfirmation()
    Sends a confirmation to the master that this simulator has ended moving people.
    void sendPerson​(Person person, Position targetPosition)
    Sends person in predefined string format.
    void sendPersonConfirmation​(int personalNumber, boolean confirmation)
    Sends confirmation of accepting person by location in this simulators area
    void sendStats​(Stats stats)
    Sends general statistical information to the simulator.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MasterConnection

      public MasterConnection​(java.net.Socket socket) throws java.io.IOException
      Master connection constructor. Extracts input and output streams from the socket and stores them for later use.
      Parameters:
      socket - Socket connected to the Master.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error opening the input/output streams.

  • Method Details

    • sendPerson

      public void sendPerson​(Person person, Position targetPosition)
      Sends person in predefined string format.
      Parameters:
      person - person to send.
      targetPosition - position that the person should land on.

    • sendPersonConfirmation

      public void sendPersonConfirmation​(int personalNumber, boolean confirmation)
      Sends confirmation of accepting person by location in this simulators area
      Parameters:
      personalNumber - personal number of referenced person.
      confirmation - true if person was accepted, false if person was rejected.

    • sendExtract

      public void sendExtract​(Location[] area)
      Sends information about Locations in the area.
      Parameters:
      area - Array of Location in the requested area.

    • sendStats

      public void sendStats​(Stats stats)
      Sends general statistical information to the simulator.
      Parameters:
      stats - stats to send.

    • sendPeopleMovedConfirmation

      public void sendPeopleMovedConfirmation()
      Sends a confirmation to the master that this simulator has ended moving people.

    • sendHealthCalculatedConfirmation

      public void sendHealthCalculatedConfirmation()
      Sends a confirmation to the master that this simulator has ended calculating peoples health.

    • listen

      public boolean listen​(Simulator simulator)
      Accepts commands from master application and executes them using respective methods of simulator.
      Parameters:
      simulator - simulator class to execute commands from master application.
      Returns:
      true until receiving ExitSim command or until losing connection to the master, then return false.
